sources.source: Use this source if you have only the original game, with no expansion packs. Note that some apparently expansion pack-only material may appear, this is because these resources are indeed part of the base NWN 2DAs. Source based on patch 1.61.

Use this source if you've purchased the first expansion pack, 'Shadows of Undrentide', or if you have the Gold edition; and you do not have the second expansion pack (Underdark) installed. Some material from Underdark may still appear, this is because these resources are indeed part of the SoU 2DAs. Source based on patch 1.61.

Use this source EITHER if you have BOTH Undrentide AND Underdark installed, OR you have ONLY Underdark installed. The 2DA files released by BioWare for Underdark include all of the information for Undrentide, as well. Source based on patch 1.61.
Use this source with material from the Player Resource Consortium
